trans-unit.source: What is LibreOffice?
trans-unit.target: 什麼是LibreOffice

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice is a freely available, fully-featured office productivity suite. Its native file format is Open Document Format (ODF), an open standard format that is being adopted by governments worldwide as a required file format for publishing and accepting documents. LibreOffice can also open and save documents in many other formats, including those used by several versions of Microsoft Office.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice是一個可以免費取得、全功能的辦公室套件。它預設的檔案格式開放文件格式(ODF)，一個被世界上許多政府應用在發布及接收文件的開放格式。LibreOffice也可以開啟及儲存成許多其他檔案格式，包含部分版本的Microsoft Office格式。

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice includes the following components.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice有以下組件。

trans-unit.source: Writer (word processor)
trans-unit.target: Writer (文書處理)

trans-unit.source: Writer is a feature-rich tool for creating letters, books, reports, newsletters, brochures, and other documents. You can insert graphics and objects from other components into Writer documents. Writer can export files to HTML, XHTML, XML, Adobe Portable Document Format (PDF), and several versions of Microsoft Word files. It also connects to your email client.
trans-unit.target: Writer是一個功能豐富的工具，用來建立書信，書籍，報告，電子報，宣傳冊以及其他文件。你可以將其他組件的圖形及物件添加進Writer文件裡。Writer可以將文件輸出成HTML、XHTML、XML、Adobe攜帶式文件格式(PDF），以及部分版本的Microsoft Word文件。Writer也可以連接到你的email客戶端。

trans-unit.source: Calc (spreadsheet)
trans-unit.target: Calc (試算表)

trans-unit.source: Calc has all of the advanced analysis, charting, and decision making features expected from a high-end spreadsheet. It includes over 300 functions for financial, statistical, and mathematical operations, among others. The Scenario Manager provides “what if” analysis. Calc generates 2D and 3D charts, which can be integrated into other LibreOffice documents. You can also open and work with Microsoft Excel workbooks and save them in Excel format. Calc can also export spreadsheets in several formats, including for example Comma Separated Value (CSV), Adobe PDF and HTML formats.
trans-unit.target: Calc擁有所有高級試算表所需要的進階分析、圖表、以及決策分析的功能。它包含了超過300個用於財經、統計以及數學運算等的公式。分析藍本提供了「what if」分析。Calc可以產生2D與3D圖表，並且可以嵌入至其他LibreOffice文件中。你也可以開啟並編輯Microsoft Excel的工作表並儲存成Excel格式。Calc也可以將試算表輸出成一些其他格式，像是逗點分隔值文件(CSV)、Adobe PDF以及HTML格式。

trans-unit.source: Impress (presentations)
trans-unit.target: Impress (簡報)

trans-unit.source: Impress provides all the common multimedia presentation tools, such as special effects, animation, and drawing tools. It is integrated with the advanced graphics capabilities of LibreOffice Draw and Math components. Slideshows can be further enhanced using Fontwork special effects text, as well as sound and video clips. Impress is compatible with Microsoft PowerPoint file format and can also save your work in numerous graphics formats.
trans-unit.target: Impress提供所有常用的多媒體簡報工具，像是特效、動畫以及繪畫工具。它也內嵌了一些LibreOffice Draw及Math的進階繪圖組件。投影片也可以利用美術字，或是聲音及短片進行強化。Impress和Microsoft PowerPoint檔案格式相容並且也可以將你的作品儲存成多種圖形格式。

trans-unit.source: Draw (vector graphics)
trans-unit.target: Draw (向量圖形)

trans-unit.source: Draw is a vector drawing tool that can produce everything from simple diagrams or flowcharts to 3D artwork. Its Smart Connectors feature allows you to define your own connection points. You can use Draw to create drawings for use in any of the LibreOffice components, and you can create your own clip art and then add it to the Gallery. Draw can import graphics from many common formats and save them in over 20 formats, including PNG, HTML and PDF.
trans-unit.target: Draw是一個向量繪圖工具，從簡單的圖表或流程圖，到3D藝術作品皆可以利用它來產生。它的智慧連接功能使你可以自定義連接點。你可以使用Draw來建立用在其他LibreOffice組件的圖案，你也可以建立自己的藝術作品並加進你的圖庫中。Draw可以許多常見格式中匯入圖形並儲存成超過20種格式，包括PNG、HTML以及PDF。

trans-unit.source: Base (database)
trans-unit.target: Base (資料庫)

trans-unit.source: Base provides tools for day-to-day database work within a simple interface. It can create and edit forms, reports, queries, tables, views, and relations, so that managing a relational database is much the same as in other popular database applications. Base provides many new features, such as the ability to analyze and edit relationships from a diagram view. Base incorporates two relational database engines, HSQLDB and PostgreSQL. It can also use dBASE, Microsoft Access, MySQL, or Oracle, or any ODBC compliant or JDBC compliant database. Base also provides support for a subset of ANSI-92 SQL.
trans-unit.target: Base提供了為日常資料庫處理的簡單界面。它可以建立及編輯表格、報告、視圖及關聯，所以管理關聯式資料庫幾乎和用其他熱門的資料庫程式一樣。Base提供許多新功能,像是從圖表視圖來分析及編輯關聯的能力。Base合併了兩種關聯式資料庫引擎，HSQLDB及PostgreSQL。它也可以使用dBASE、Microsoft Access、MySQL、Orcale、或其他ODBC兼容或JDBC兼容的資料庫。Base也提供對ANSI-92 SQL的部份支援。

trans-unit.source: Math (formula editor)
trans-unit.target: Math (公式編輯器)

trans-unit.source: Math is the LibreOffice formula or equation editor. You can use it to create complex equations that include symbols or characters not available in standard font sets. While it is most commonly used to create formulas in other documents, such as Writer and Impress files, Math can also work as a standalone tool. You can save formulas in the standard Mathematical Markup Language (MathML) format for inclusion in web pages and other documents not created by LibreOffice.
trans-unit.target: Math是LibreOffice的公式或等式編輯器。你可以使用他來建立包括標準字型集合內不存在的符號或字元的等式。雖然它最常用來建立其他文件用的等式(像是Writer或是Impress)，Math也可以作為獨立工具。你可以以標準數學標示語言(MathML)格式來儲存公式，並用來嵌入在網頁或是其他非LibreOffice所建立的文件中。

trans-unit.source: Advantages of LibreOffice
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice的優點

trans-unit.source: Here are some of the advantages of LibreOffice over other office suites:
trans-unit.target: 以下為一些LibreOffice相較於其他辦公室套件的優點：

trans-unit.source: No licensing fees. LibreOffice is free for anyone to use and distribute at no cost. Many features that are available as extra cost add-ins in other office suites (like PDF export) are free with LibreOffice. There are no hidden charges now or in the future.
trans-unit.target: 沒有授權費用。LibreOffice對於所有人皆是免費使用及許可散播的。許多在其他辦公室套件中需要付費的擴充套件(像是PDF輸出)，在LibreOffice中都是免費的。在目前及未來的軟體中皆不會有隱藏收費。

trans-unit.source: Open source. You can distribute, copy, and modify the software as much as you wish, in accordance with the LibreOffice Open Source licenses.
trans-unit.target: 開放原始碼。你可以依照你的方式散播、複製以及編輯這套程式，只要遵守LibreOffice開源授權條款。

trans-unit.source: Cross-platform. LibreOffice runs on several hardware architectures and under multiple operating systems, such as Microsoft Windows, Mac OS X and Linux.
trans-unit.target: 跨平台。LibreOffice可以在許多硬體架構下及多種系統上運作，包含Microsoft Windows、Mac OS X及Linux。

trans-unit.source: Extensive language support. The LibreOffice user interface, including spelling, hyphenation, and thesaurus dictionaries, is available in over 100 languages and dialects. LibreOffice also provides support for both Complex Text Layout (CTL) and Right to Left (RTL) layout languages (such as Urdu, Hebrew, and Arabic).
trans-unit.target: 多語言支援。LibreOffice的界面，包含文字、排版以及詞庫，支持超過100種語言及方言。LibreOffice也提供了複合式版面配置(CTL)以及右至左(RTL)版面配置語言(像是Urdu、Hebrew以及Arabic等)。

trans-unit.source: Consistent user interface. All the components have a similar “look and feel,” making them easy to use and master.
trans-unit.target: 一致的界面。所有組件擁有相似的「外觀及感覺」，使其容易使用及精通。

trans-unit.source: Integration. The components of LibreOffice are well integrated with one another.
trans-unit.target: 整合。所有LibreOffice的組件都和彼此高度整合。

trans-unit.source: All the components share a common spelling checker and other tools, which are used consistently across the suite. For example, the drawing tools available in Writer are also found in Calc, with similar but enhanced versions in Impress and Draw.
trans-unit.target: 所有組件共享拼字檢查及其他工具，使用方法皆相同。舉個例子，繪圖工具可以在Writer與Calc中使用，而在Impress與Draw中則有相似但更加強化的版本。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to know which application was used to create a particular file. For example, you can open a Draw file from Writer.
trans-unit.target: 你可以不用知道當時是用什麼軟體建立特定檔案。舉個例子，你可以在Writer中開啟Draw的檔案。

trans-unit.source: Granularity. Usually, if you change an option, it affects all components. However, LibreOffice options can be set at a component level or even at document level.
trans-unit.target: 彈性。通常當你改變一個選項，它將影響所有組件。然而，LibreOffice的設定可以只套用在單一組件甚至是單一檔案。

trans-unit.source: File compatibility. In addition to its native OpenDocument formats, LibreOffice includes support for opening and saving files in many common formats including Microsoft Office, HTML, XML, WordPerfect, Lotus 1-2-3, and PDF.
trans-unit.target: 檔案相容性。除了原生的OpenDocument格式，LibreOffice包含了對於許多常見格式，如Microsoft Office、HTML、XML、WordPerfect、Lotus 1-2-3以及PDF格式的開啟及儲存支援。

trans-unit.source: No vendor lock-in. LibreOffice uses OpenDocument, an XML (eXtensible Markup Language) file format developed as an industry standard by OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards). These files can easily be unzipped and read by any text editor, and their framework is open and published.
trans-unit.target: 沒有品牌鎖定。LibreOffice使用OpenDocument格式，一種由OASIS(結構化資訊標準促進組織)所制定成為工業標準的XML(可延伸標記式語言)格式。這些檔案可以被輕易的解壓縮並且被任何文字編輯器所讀取，而且他們的架構也是開放且公開的。

trans-unit.source: You have a voice. Enhancements, software fixes, and release dates are community-driven. You can join the community and affect the course of the product you use.
trans-unit.target: 你有發言權。強化、軟體修復以及發布日期皆是由社群決定。你可以參與社群並影響你所使用的軟體。

trans-unit.source: You can read more about LibreOffice and The Document Foundation on their websites at http://www.libreoffice.org/ and http://www.documentfoundation.org/.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在LibreOffice及The Document Foundation的網頁上找到更多資訊，http://www.libreoffice.org/及http://www.documentfoundation.org/。

trans-unit.source: Minimum requirements
trans-unit.target: 最低需求

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice 6.0 requires one of the following operating systems:
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice 6.0 需要在以下作業系統執行：

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Windows: Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1, Windows Server 2012, or Windows 10.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Windows： Windows Server 2008, Windows 7, Windows 8/8.1, Windows Server 2012, or Windows 10。

trans-unit.source: GNU/Linux Kernel version 2.6.18, glibc2 v2.5 or higher, and gtk v2.10.4 or higher
trans-unit.target: GNU/Linux Kernel version 2.6.18, glibc2 v2.5 or higher, and gtk v2.10.4 or higher

trans-unit.source: Mac OS X 10.8 (Mountain Lion) or higher
trans-unit.target: Mac OS X 10.8 (Mountain Lion) or higher

trans-unit.source: Administrator rights are needed for the installation process.
trans-unit.target: 安裝過程中需要管理員權限。

trans-unit.source: Some LibreOffice features (wizards and the HSQLDB database engine) require that the Java Runtime Environment (JRE) is installed on your computer. Although LibreOffice will work without Java support, some features will not be available.
trans-unit.target: 一些LibreOffice功能(精靈及HSQLDB資料庫引擎)需要你的電腦上裝有Java Runtime Environment (JRE)。雖然LibreOffice可以不用Java就可以執行，但是一些功能將無法使用。

trans-unit.source: Java is available at no cost. More information and download links to the appropriate edition for your operating system can be found at: https://java.com/en/download/manual.jsp
trans-unit.target: Java可以免費取得。更多資訊及對於你的系統合適的下載連結可以在以下網站中找到：https://java.com/en/download/manual.jsp

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: 提示

trans-unit.source: If you want to use LibreOffice features that require Java it is important that the correct 32 bit or 64 bit edition matches the installed version of LibreOffice. See the Advanced Options in Chapter 2 of this guide.
trans-unit.target: 如果你想使用需要Java的LibreOffice功能，有正確對應LibreOffice 32位元或是64位元版本的Java是很重要的，請參照在本指引中第二章的進階選項。

trans-unit.source: For a more detailed listing of requirements, see the LibreOffice website, http://www.libreoffice.org/get-help/system-requirements/.
trans-unit.target: 如要了解更詳細的需求，請參照LibreOffice的網頁，http://www.libreoffice.org/get-help/system-requirements/。

trans-unit.source: How to get the software
trans-unit.target: 如何取得軟體

trans-unit.source: Versions of LibreOffice for Windows, Linux, and Mac OS X can be downloaded free from http://www.libreoffice.org/download. You can also download the software by using a Peer-to-Peer client, such as BitTorrent, at the same address.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice的Windows、Linux及Mac OS X版本可以在http://www.libreoffice.org/download免費下載。你也可以使用點對點(P2P)客戶端，像是BitTorrent，在相同位置取得。

trans-unit.source: Linux users will also find LibreOffice included in many of the latest Linux distributions; Ubuntu is just one example.
trans-unit.target: Linux使用者也可以從許多最新的Linux發行版中找到LibreOffice;像是Ubuntu等。

trans-unit.source: macOS users can also get two versions of LibreOffice from the App Store: LibreOffice Vanilla (small fee) and LibreOffice-from-Collabora (an enterprise-ready version; small fee).
trans-unit.target: macOS用戶也可以從App Store中取得兩種版本的LibreOffice：LibreOffice Vanilla(須小額費用)及LibreOffice-from-Collabora(企業版本;須小額費用)

trans-unit.source: How to install the software
trans-unit.target: 如何安裝軟體

trans-unit.source: Information on installing and setting up LibreOffice on the various supported operating systems is given here: http://www.libreoffice.org/get-help/install-howto/.
trans-unit.target: 關於在不同系統安裝及設定LibreOffice的資訊在以下網址提供：http://www.libreoffice.org/get-help/install-howto/。

trans-unit.source: Extensions and add-ons
trans-unit.target: 擴充套件

trans-unit.source: Extensions and add-ons are available to enhance LibreOffice. Several extensions are installed with the program and you can get others from the official extensions repository, http://extensions.libreoffice.org/. See Chapter 14, Customizing LibreOffice for more information on installing extensions and add-ons.
trans-unit.target: 擴充套件可用來加強LibreOffice。有些是隨程式安裝，而其他的可以從官方渠道獲得，http://extensions.libreoffice.org/。參照第十四章，自訂LibreOffice，以取得關於安裝擴充套件的更多資訊。

trans-unit.source: Starting LibreOffice
trans-unit.target: 啟動LibreOffice

trans-unit.source: In general, you start LibreOffice the same way you start any other program on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 通常來說，你可以像啟動其他軟體一樣在您的電腦上啟動LibreOffice。

trans-unit.source: On computers with Windows or Linux operating systems, a menu entry for LibreOffice and each LibreOffice component appears in the system menu of your computer. On computers operating macOS, only a menu entry for LibreOffice is added to the Applications menu.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows或Linux系統的電腦上，LibreOffice及LibreOffice組件的捷徑會出現在你電腦的系統選單中。而在macOS 系統的電腦上，只有一個LibreOffice的捷徑新增到應用程式選單。

trans-unit.source: Clicking on the LibreOffice menu entry, desktop icon, or tile opens the LibreOffice Start Center (Figure ) from where you can select the individual components of LibreOffice. You can also select to open an existing file or use a template.
trans-unit.target: 點擊LibreOffice的捷徑、桌面圖示或動態磚會開啟LibreOffice啟動中心(圖)，從這邊你可以選擇每個獨立的LibreOffice組件。你也可以開啟已存在的檔案或是使用範本。

trans-unit.source: Opening an existing document before starting LibreOffice
trans-unit.target: 在開啟LibreOffice前開啟一個已存在的文件

trans-unit.source: You can start LibreOffice by double-clicking the filename of an ODF document on the desktop, or in a file manager such as Windows Explorer or the Mac’s Finder. The appropriate component of LibreOffice will start and the document will be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 你可以利用在桌面，或是像Windows Explorer或是Mac's Finder等檔案管理員中雙擊ODF格式的檔案啟動LibreOffice。相關的LibreOffice組件將會啟動並載入文件。

trans-unit.source: You can also open files stored in remote servers running Content Management Interoperability Services (CMIS). CMIS, like OpenDocument Format, is an OASIS standard. When using CMIS servers, the service will ask you for the necessary credentials for file access.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以開啟儲存在運行內容管理互通服務(CMIS)的遠端伺服器的文件。CMIS，像是OpenDocument格式，是一種OASIS標準。當使用CMIS伺服器，伺服器端將會要求提出檔案存取權限的相關證明。

trans-unit.source: Figure : LibreOffice Start Center
trans-unit.target: 圖:LibreOffice啟動中心

trans-unit.source: If you do not have Microsoft Office installed on your computer, or if Microsoft Office is installed but you have associated Microsoft Office file types with LibreOffice, then when you double-click on the following files, they open in LibreOffice:
trans-unit.target: 如果你的電腦上沒有安裝Microsoft Office，或是有安裝Microsoft Office但是你將其檔案格式關聯到LibreOffice，那麼當你雙擊以下檔案格式時，將會在LibreOffice中顯示。

trans-unit.source: A Word file (*.doc or *.docx) opens in Writer.
trans-unit.target: Word檔案(*.doc或*.docx)會在Writer中開啟。

trans-unit.source: An Excel file (*.xls or *.xlsx) opens in Calc.
trans-unit.target: Excel檔案(*.xls或*.xlsx)會在Calc中開啟。

trans-unit.source: A PowerPoint file (*.ppt or *.pptx) opens in Impress.
trans-unit.target: PowerPoint檔案(*.ppt或*.pptx)會在Impress中開啟。

trans-unit.source: If you did not associate the file types and Microsoft Office is installed on your computer, then when you double-click on a Microsoft Office file, it opens using the appropriate Microsoft Office component.
trans-unit.target: 如果你沒有關聯這些檔案類型而且Microsoft Office已安裝在你的電腦上，那麼當你雙擊Microsoft Office檔案，那麼將會啟動相關的Microsoft Office組件。

trans-unit.source: For more information on opening files, see “” on page .
trans-unit.target: 關於更多開啟檔案的資訊，請參照第的「」。

trans-unit.source: Quickstarter
trans-unit.target: 快速啟動

trans-unit.source: When LibreOffice is installed on computers running Windows or Linux, a Quickstarter feature may also be installed. When Quickstarter is activated, the necessary library files are loaded when the computer system is started, resulting in a shorter startup time for LibreOffice components.
trans-unit.target: 當LibreOffice安裝在Windows或Linux系統的電腦，快速啟動功能有可能也同時安裝。當快速啟動啟用時，重要的函式庫檔案將在系統啟動時載入，使啟動LibreOffice組件時能夠更加快速。

trans-unit.source: Computers with a macOS do not have a Quickstarter.
trans-unit.target: macOS系統的電腦並沒有快速啟動功能。

trans-unit.source: Activating Quickstarter
trans-unit.target: 啟用快速啟動

trans-unit.source: On a computer using Linux or Windows operating systems, the default installation of LibreOffice does not set the Quickstarter to load automatically. To activate it:
trans-unit.target: 在Linux或是Windows系統的電腦上，LibreOffice預設安裝選項將不會使快速啟動自動載入。如果要啟用它：

trans-unit.source: Open LibreOffice.
trans-unit.target: 開啟LibreOffice。

trans-unit.source: Go to Tools > Options > LibreOffice > General on the Menu bar and select Load LibreOffice during system start-up (if using Windows) or select Enable systray Quickstarter (if using Linux).
trans-unit.target: 至選單列中 工具 > 選項 > LibreOffice > 一般 並選擇 系統初始啟動時載入LibreOffice(Windows)或是選擇啟用快速啟動系統圖示(Linux)。

trans-unit.source: Close and restart LibreOffice to have Quickstarter appear.
trans-unit.target: 關閉並重啟LibreOffice使快速啟動出現。

trans-unit.source: Using Quickstarter on Linux or Windows
trans-unit.target: 在Linux或Windows上使用快速啟動

trans-unit.source: After Quickstarter has been activated, an icon is installed into the system tray at the bottom of the display. Quickstarter is then available at all times, whether LibreOffice is open or not.
trans-unit.target: 當快速啟動啟用後，一個圖示會被加入螢幕下方的系統圖示列中。如此一來快速啟動隨時皆可存取，不論LibreOffice使否啟動。

trans-unit.source: To start a LibreOffice component directly by using Quickstarter:
trans-unit.target: 直接從快速啟動中啟動LibreOffice組件：

trans-unit.source: Right-click the Quickstarter icon in the system tray to open a pop-up menu (Figure ).
trans-unit.target: 在系統圖示中的快速啟動圖示點擊右鍵以開啟選單(圖)。

trans-unit.source: Select the LibreOffice component you want to open to create a new document, or select From Template to open the Template Manager, or select Open Document to open an existing document.
trans-unit.target: 選擇你想要開啟並用來建立新文件的LibreOffice組件，或選擇從範本來開啟範本管理器，或選擇開啟文件來開啟已存在的文件。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Quickstarter menu in Windows
trans-unit.target: 圖：Windows上的快速啟動選單

trans-unit.source: Disabling Quickstarter
trans-unit.target: 禁用快速啟動

trans-unit.source: To temporarily close Quickstarter on a computer using a Windows operating system, right-click on the Quickstarter icon in the system tray and select Exit Quickstarter in the pop-up menu. However, when the computer is restarted, Quickstarter will be loaded again.
trans-unit.target: 如果要在Windows系統的電腦上暫時禁用快速啟動，請在快速啟動的圖示上點擊右鍵並選擇離開快速啟動。然而，當電腦重啟時，快速啟動將被重新載入。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the Quickstarter from loading during system startup, do one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 如要防止系統載入時啟動快速啟動，請選擇以下的一種方式：

trans-unit.source: Right-click on the Quickstarter icon and deselect Load LibreOffice during system start-up on the pop-up menu (on Windows) or select Disable systray Quickstarter (on Linux).
trans-unit.target: 在快速啟動圖示上點擊右鍵並取消選取系統初始啟動時載入LibreOffice(Windows)，或是禁用快速啟動系統圖示(Linux)。

trans-unit.source: Go to Tools > Options > LibreOffice > General on the Menu bar and deselect Load LibreOffice during system start-up (on Windows) or deselect Enable systray Quickstarter on Linux.
trans-unit.target: 至選單列中 工具 > 選項 > LibreOffice > 一般 並取消選擇系統初始啟動時載入LibreOffice(Windows) 或是取消選擇啟用快速啟動系統圖示(Linux)。

trans-unit.source: Reactivating Quickstarter
trans-unit.target: 重新啟用快速啟動

trans-unit.source: If Quickstarter has been disabled, you can reactivate it by using the instructions given in “” above.
trans-unit.target: 如果快速啟動被禁用，你可以利用以上「」的步驟來重新啟用。

trans-unit.source: Parts of the main window
trans-unit.target: 主頁面布局

trans-unit.source: The main window is similar for each component of LibreOffice, although some details vary. See the relevant chapters in this guide about Writer, Calc, Draw, and Impress for descriptions of those details.
trans-unit.target: 每個LibreOffice組件的主頁面都非常相似，然而有一些細節會不同。請參照本指引中對於Writer, Calc, Draw及Impress的相關章節來了解更多細節。

trans-unit.source: Common features include the Menu bar, standard toolbar, and formatting toolbar at the top of the window and the status bar at the bottom.
trans-unit.target: 共同的功能包括在視窗上方的選單列、標準工具列、格式工具列以及下方的狀態列。

trans-unit.source: Menu bar
trans-unit.target: 選單列

trans-unit.source: The Menu bar is located across the top of the LibreOffice window, just below the title bar. When you select one of the menus listed below, a sub-menu drops down to show commands. Below is the case for Writer:
trans-unit.target: 選單列在整個LibreOffice視窗的上方，只在標題列的下方。當你選擇以下的選單，將有一個子選單出現並顯示指令。以下是Writer的示例：

trans-unit.source: File – contains commands that apply to the entire document such as Open, Save, and Export as PDF.
trans-unit.target: 檔案 – 包含對於整個文件的指令，像是開啟、儲存以及匯出成PDF等。

trans-unit.source: Edit – contains commands for editing the document such as Undo, Find & Replace, Cut, Copy, and Paste.
trans-unit.target: 編輯 – 包含編輯文件的指令，像是復原、尋找與取代、剪下、複製以及貼上等。

trans-unit.source: View – contains commands for controlling the display of the document such as Zoom and Web Layout.
trans-unit.target: 檢視 – 包含控制文件顯示的指令，像是縮放或是網頁版面配置等。

trans-unit.source: Insert – contains commands for inserting elements into your document such as Header, Footer, and Image.
trans-unit.target: 插入 – 包含插入元素進入文件的指令，像是頁首、頁尾以及圖片等。

trans-unit.source: Format – contains commands for formatting the layout of your document.
trans-unit.target: 格式 – 包含修改文件版面配置的各種指令。

trans-unit.source: Styles – contains commands for quickly applying common styles; for editing, loading, and creating new styles; and for accessing the Styles and Formatting section of the Sidebar.
trans-unit.target: 樣式 – 包含快速應用常見樣式、編輯、載入、建立新樣式、以及存取側邊欄樣式區的指令。

trans-unit.source: Table – contains commands to insert and edit a table in a text document.
trans-unit.target: 表格 – 包含插入及編輯文件中表格的指令。

trans-unit.source: Tools – contains functions such as Spelling and Grammar, AutoCorrect, Customize, and Options.
trans-unit.target: 工具 – 包含像是拼字檢查、自動校正、自訂及選項的指令。

trans-unit.source: Window – contains commands for the display window.
trans-unit.target: 視窗 – 包含視窗顯示的各種指令。

trans-unit.source: Help – contains links to the LibreOffice Help file, What’s This?, and information about the program.
trans-unit.target: 說明 – 包含導向到LibreOffice說明文件的連結、這是什麼、以及對於此程式的資訊。

trans-unit.source: Toolbars
trans-unit.target: 工具列

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice has two types of toolbars: docked (fixed in place) and floating. Docked toolbars can be moved to different locations or made to float, and floating toolbars can be docked.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice有兩種類型的工具列：固定(在某處不動的)以及浮動的工具列。固定的工具列可以被移動到其他位置或變成浮動、而浮動的工具列也可被固定。

trans-unit.source: In a default LibreOffice installation, the top docked toolbar, just under the Menu bar, is called the Standard toolbar. It is consistent across the LibreOffice applications.
trans-unit.target: 在使用LibreOffice預設的安裝選項下，在選單列下方的工具列，稱為標準工具列。此工具列在所有LibreOffice組件中皆相同。

trans-unit.source: The second toolbar at the top, in a default LibreOffice installation, is the Formatting bar. It is context-sensitive; that is, it shows the tools relevant to the current position of the cursor or the object selected. For example, when the cursor is on a graphic, the Formatting bar provides tools for formatting graphics; when the cursor is in text, the tools are for formatting text.
trans-unit.target: 在使用LibreOffice預設的安裝選項下，標準工具列下方的是格式工具列。他會對於內容而改變；也就是說，他會顯示現在游標或是選取物件的相關工具。比方說，當游標在一個圖形上時，格式工具列會顯示圖形相關的工具；當游標在文字時，會顯示關於文字格式的工具。

trans-unit.source: In some cases it is convenient to reduce the number of toolbars displayed and get more space for the document. LibreOffice provides a single-toolbar alternative to the default double-toolbar setup. It contains the most-used commands. To activate it, enable View > Toolbars > Standard (Single Mode) and disable View > Toolbars > Standard and View > Toolbars > Formatting.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況中，減少工具列的數量並取得更多顯示文件的空間會更加便利。LibreOffice提供了一個單一工具列取代原本雙層工具列的設置。它包含了許多常用的指令。如果要啟用它，請選取 檢視 > 工具列 > 標準(單工具列模式) 並禁用 檢視 > 工具列 > 標準 及 檢視 > 工具列 > 格式設定。

trans-unit.source: Displaying or hiding toolbars
trans-unit.target: 顯示或隱藏工具列

trans-unit.source: To display or hide toolbars, go to View > Toolbars on the Menu bar, then click on the name of a toolbar from the drop-down list. An active toolbar shows a check-mark beside its name. Toolbars created from tool palettes are not listed in the View menu.
trans-unit.target: 如要顯示或隱藏工具列，請到選單列的 檢視 > 工具列 ，並點選下拉式選單中工具列的名稱。被啟用的工具列會在其名字旁顯示打勾的圖案。而產生自工具頁的工具列則不會顯示在檢視選單中。

trans-unit.source: To close a toolbar go to View > Toolbars on the Menu bar and deselect the toolbar, or right-click in an empty space between the icons on a toolbar and select Close toolbar from the context menu.
trans-unit.target: 如要關閉某個工具列，請至選單列中的 檢視 > 工具列 並取消選取工具列，或是在工具列的空白區域按下右鍵並選擇關閉工具列。

trans-unit.source: Sub-menus and tool palettes
trans-unit.target: 子選單或工具頁

trans-unit.source: Toolbar icons with a small triangle to the right will display sub-menus, tool palettes, and alternative methods of selecting items, depending on the icon.
trans-unit.target: 工具列中帶有小三角形圖案的圖示將會顯示子選單、工具頁，以及其他對所選物件的選項，取決於圖示的功能。

trans-unit.source: Tool palettes can be made into a floating toolbar. Figure shows an example of a tool palette from the Drawing toolbar made into a floating toolbar. See “” and “” below for more information on moving and floating these toolbars created from tool palettes.
trans-unit.target: 工具頁可以變成浮動工具列。圖展示了將繪圖工具列中的工具頁變成浮動型態的效果。參照底下的「」及「」來取得移動工具頁及將工具頁變為浮動顯示的更多資訊。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Example of tearing off a tool palette
trans-unit.target: 圖：將工具頁分離

trans-unit.source: Moving toolbars
trans-unit.target: 移動工具列

trans-unit.source: Docked toolbars can be undocked and moved to a new docked position or left as a floating toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 固定的工具列可以被解鎖並移動到新的固定位置或是變成浮動工具列。

trans-unit.source: Move the mouse cursor over the toolbar handle, which is the small vertical bar to the left of a docked toolbar and highlighted in Figure .
trans-unit.target: 將滑鼠移動到工具列標的，也就是在固定工具列左邊的小直線，也就是圖中所標明的位置。

trans-unit.source: Hold down the left mouse button and drag the toolbar to the new location. The toolbar can be docked in a new position at the top, sides or bottom of the main window, or left as a floating toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 按住滑鼠左鍵並拖曳工具列到新的位置。工具列可以被固定在視窗的側邊或上下方，或是變成浮動工具列。

trans-unit.source: Release the mouse button.
trans-unit.target: 鬆開滑鼠按紐。

trans-unit.source: To move a floating toolbar, click on its title bar and drag it to a new floating location or dock the toolbar at the top or bottom of the main window.
trans-unit.target: 如要移動浮動工具列，在它的標題列按下左鍵並拖曳到新的位置或是將其固定在視窗的上下方。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Toolbar handles
trans-unit.target: 圖：工具列標的

trans-unit.source: Floating toolbars
trans-unit.target: 浮動工具列

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice includes several additional toolbars, whose default setting appear as floating toolbars in response to the current position of the cursor or selection. You can dock these toolbars to the top or bottom of the main window, or reposition them on your computer display (see “” above).
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice包含許多額外的工具列，他們的預設值是根據游標或是選擇物件的位置顯示浮動的工具列，你可以這些工具列固定在視窗的上下方，或是移動到螢幕的任意位置(參照上面的「」)。

trans-unit.source: Some of these additional toolbars are context sensitive and will automatically appear depending on the position of the cursor. For example, when the cursor is in a table, a Table toolbar appears, and when the cursor is in a numbered or bullet list, the Bullets and Numbering toolbar appears.
trans-unit.target: 其中一些額外的工具列將自動根據文件內容，在滑鼠所指的位置顯示。比如說，當游標指向一個表格，表格工具列則會出現，而當游標指向一個項目符號，項目符號與編號工具列將會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Customizing toolbars
trans-unit.target: 自訂工具列

trans-unit.source: You can customize toolbars in several ways, including choosing which icons are visible and locking the position of a docked toolbar. You can also add icons and create new toolbars, as described in Chapter 14 Customizing LibreOffice. To access the customization options for a toolbar, right-click in an empty space between the icons on a toolbar to open a context menu as follows:
trans-unit.target: 你可以用許多方式自訂工具列，包含選擇哪些圖示要顯示以及將工具列固定在某個位置。你也可以增加圖示或建立新的工具列，此部分將在第十四章 自訂LibreOffice介紹。如要存取工具列的自訂選項，請在工具列圖示中的空白區域按右鍵來開啟如下的右鍵選單：

trans-unit.source: To show or hide icons defined for the selected toolbar, click Visible Buttons. Visible icons on a toolbar are indicated by an outline around the icon (Figure ) or by a check mark beside the icon, depending on your operating system. Select or deselect icons to hide or show them on the toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 如要顯示或隱藏所選工具列的圖示，請按下可視按紐。可見的按鈕將會以顯示外框(圖)或是打勾圖案來標記，取決於你的作業系統。選取或取消選取他們來控制是否要顯示在工具列上。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Selection of visible toolbar icons
trans-unit.target: 圖:選擇可見的工具列圖示

trans-unit.source: Click Customize Toolbar to open the Customize dialog; See Chapter 14 Customizing LibreOffice for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在自訂工具列按下左鍵會開啟自訂視窗；參照第十四章 自訂LibreOffice以取得更多資訊。

trans-unit.source: Click Dock Toolbar to dock the selected floating toolbar. By default, a toolbar will dock at the top of the workspace. You can reposition the toolbar to a different docked position. See “” on page .
trans-unit.target: 在停駐工具列按下左鍵來固定一個浮動工具列。在預設值中，工具列將會固定在工作區域的上方。你可以將其移動到其他不同位置。參照「」在第頁。

trans-unit.source: Click Dock All Toolbars to dock all floating toolbars. By default, toolbars will dock at the top of the workspace. You can reposition the toolbars to different docked positions. See “” on page .
trans-unit.target: 在停駐所有工具列按下左鍵來固定所有浮動工具列。在預設值中，工具列將會固定在工作區域的上方。你可以將其移動到其他不同位置。參照「」在第頁。

trans-unit.source: Click Lock Toolbar Position to lock a docked toolbar into its docked position.
trans-unit.target: 在鎖定工具列位置按下左鍵來鎖定工具列到一個固定的位置。

trans-unit.source: Click Close Toolbar to close the selected toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 在關閉工具列按下左鍵來關閉所選工具列。

trans-unit.source: Context menus
trans-unit.target: 右鍵選單

trans-unit.source: Context menus provide quick access to many menu functions. They are opened by right-clicking on a paragraph, graphic, or other object. When a context menu opens, the functions or options available will depend on the object that has been selected. A context menu can be the easiest way to reach a function, especially if you are not sure where the function is located in the menus or toolbars. By default, context menus will display an applicable keyboard shortcut if one has been set. If you wish, you can toggle this visibility off or on in Tools > Options > View > Menu.
trans-unit.target: 右鍵選單提供了能快速存取選單的功能。右鍵選單可經由在文章段落、圖形、或其他物件上按下右鍵來開啟。當右鍵選單開啟時，可使用的功能將會取決於你所選取的物件。右鍵選單是最簡單存取功能的方法，特別是當你並不知道某個功能在哪一個選單或是工具列時。在預設值中，右鍵選單將會顯示每個功能相對應的快捷鍵。 你可以在以下位置中調整是否要顯示: 工具 > 選項 > 檢視 > 選單 。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Keyboard shortcuts in context menus
trans-unit.target: 圖 ：右鍵選單中的鍵盤快捷鍵

trans-unit.source: Status bar
trans-unit.target: 狀態列

trans-unit.source: The status bar is located at the bottom of the workspace. It provides information about the document and convenient ways to change some features quickly. It is similar in Writer, Calc, Impress, and Draw, but each LibreOffice component includes some component-specific items. An example of the Writer status bar is shown in Figure .
trans-unit.target: 狀態列的位置在工作區的下方。它提供了關於此份文件的資訊以及快速改變某些功能的方式。它在 Writer, Calc, Impress及Draw中都很相像，但是在每個LibreOffice組件中有包含一些組件特有的功能。Writer的狀態列如圖所示。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Example status bar from Writer
trans-unit.target: 圖 ：Writer的狀態列

trans-unit.source: Page, sheet, or slide number and page count
trans-unit.target: 頁碼、工作表、或是投影片編號及總頁數

trans-unit.source: Shows the current page, sheet, or slide number and the total number of pages, sheets, or slides in the document. Click on this field to open the Go to Page dialog. Other uses of this field depend on the LibreOffice component.
trans-unit.target: 顯示當前文件頁碼、工作表、或是投影片編號及頁面總數。在這邊按下左鍵會開啟頁面對話框。其他這個部分的用法將會取決於你使用的LibreOffice組件。

trans-unit.source: Words and characters
trans-unit.target: 字及字元

trans-unit.source: Shows the total number of words and characters in the document or in the selection.
trans-unit.target: 顯示當前文件或所選區域的總字數或總字元數。

trans-unit.source: Page style or slide design
trans-unit.target: 頁面樣式或是投影片設計

trans-unit.source: Shows the current page style or slide design. To edit the current page style or slide design, double-click on this field. To choose a different page style or slide design, right-click on this field and select from the list that pops up.
trans-unit.target: 顯示當前頁面樣式或是投影片的設計風格。如要編輯頁面樣式或是投影片風格，請在此區域按兩下。如要改變當前頁面樣式或是投影片風格，請在此區域按右鍵並從彈出選單中選擇。

trans-unit.source: Language
trans-unit.target: 語言

trans-unit.source: Shows the current language of the text at the current cursor position.
trans-unit.target: 顯示當前游標所指文字的語言。

trans-unit.source: Insert mode
trans-unit.target: 插入模式

trans-unit.source: Shows the type of insert mode the program is in. This field is blank if the program is in Insert mode. Each time the Ins key is pressed, or this field is clicked, the mode toggles between Insert and Overwrite.
trans-unit.target: 顯示當前的插入模式。當為插入模式時這塊區域將為空白。而每次Ins鍵按下時，或是點擊此區域時，將會在插入及複寫模式中變換。

trans-unit.source: Selection mode
trans-unit.target: 選取模式

trans-unit.source: Click to choose different selection modes. The icon does not change, but when you hover the mouse pointer over this field, a tooltip indicates which mode is active.
trans-unit.target: 按下此區以選擇不同的選取模式。此圖示不會改變，但當你移動游標到此區域上時，將會有此模式當前狀態的提示。

trans-unit.source: Unsaved changes
trans-unit.target: 未儲存的變更

trans-unit.source: The icon shown here is different when changes to the document have not been saved.
trans-unit.target: 此圖示將會顯示此份文件的修改是否還未被儲存。

trans-unit.source: Digital signature
trans-unit.target: 數位簽名

trans-unit.source: If the document has been digitally signed, an icon shows here. You can click the icon to sign the document, or to view the existing certificate.
trans-unit.target: 如果此份文件有數位簽名，將會顯示此圖示，你可以按下此圖示來簽署文件，或是檢視已存在的認證。

trans-unit.source: Object information
trans-unit.target: 物件資訊

trans-unit.source: Displays information relevant to the position of the cursor or the selected element of the document.
trans-unit.target: 顯示關於游標指向的區域或是所選元件的相關訊息。

trans-unit.source: View layout
trans-unit.target: 檢視模式

trans-unit.source: Select between Single-page view, Multiple-page view, and Book view to change how your document is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 從單頁檢視、多頁檢視或是書本檢視中選取以改變如何顯示此份文件。

trans-unit.source: Zoom slider
trans-unit.target: 縮放條

trans-unit.source: Drag the Zoom slider, or click on the + and – signs to change the view magnification of your document.
trans-unit.target: 拖曳此縮放條，或是在+及–字號上按下左鍵來改變文件顯示的大小。

trans-unit.source: Zoom percentage
trans-unit.target: 縮放比例

trans-unit.source: Indicates the magnification level of the document. Right-click on the percentage figure to open a list of magnification values from which to choose. Cicking on this percentage figure opens the Zoom & View Layout dialog.
trans-unit.target: 顯示此份文件的縮放比例。在縮放比例按下右鍵以開啟縮放倍率選單。在縮放比例按下左鍵將開啟遠近調整和檢視版面配置對話框。

trans-unit.source: Sidebar
trans-unit.target: 側邊欄

trans-unit.source: To activate the Sidebar, select View > Sidebar from the Menu bar. The Sidebar (Figure ) is located on the right side of the edit views of Writer, Calc, Impress, and Draw. It contains one or more panels, based on the current document context. Panels are organized into decks. A tab bar on the right side of the sidebar allows you to switch between different decks.
trans-unit.target: 如要啟用側邊攔，請在選單列中選取檢視 > 側邊攔。側邊欄(圖)在Writer, Calc, Impress, 及Draw的編輯區域的右邊。它包含了一個或多個面板，取決於當前文件的內容。面板會被統整進側邊欄中，在右方的切換標籤可以讓你在不同的頁面中切換。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Properties panel of Sidebar in Writer
trans-unit.target: 圖: Writer中側邊攔的屬性頁面。

trans-unit.source: All components contain the Properties, Styles and Formatting, Pages , Gallery, and Navigator decks. Some components have additional decks, such as Master Pages, Custom Animation, and Slide Transition for Impress; Manage Changes for Writer; and Functions for Calc.
trans-unit.target: 所有組件中皆包含了屬性、樣式及格式、圖庫及助手頁面。某些組件有額外的頁面，像是在Impress中有主頁、自訂動畫及投影片切換的頁面；Writer中有管理變更的頁面；Calc有函數的頁面。

trans-unit.source: A panel is like a combination of a toolbar and a dialog. For example, you can freely mix working in the main edit window to enter text and use the Properties panel in the sidebar to change text attributes.
trans-unit.target: 面板像是工具列及對話框的合體。比方說，你可以自由地在編輯區域中輸入文字並利用側邊攔的屬性頁面改變文字屬性。

trans-unit.source: Tool bars and Sidebar panels share many functions. For example, the buttons for making text bold or italic exist in both the Formatting toolbar and the Properties panel.
trans-unit.target: 工具列與側邊欄共享許多功能。比如說，使文字變為粗體及斜體的按鈕同時存在於格式工具列及側邊欄的屬性頁面。

trans-unit.source: For more detail, see the Sidebar explanation in the relevant LibreOffice component’s user guide.
trans-unit.target: 如要取得更多細節，請參照相關LibreOffice組件中的使用者手冊中關於側邊欄的描述。

trans-unit.source: To hide the Sidebar, click on the gray Hide button on the left. Click on the same button to show the Sidebar again.
trans-unit.target: 如要隱藏側邊欄，請按下左方灰色的隱藏按鈕。再按一次則會恢復顯示。

trans-unit.source: To undock the Sidebar and make it floating, and to dock a floating Sidebar, use the Sidebar settings drop-down list at the top of the tab bar (see Figure ). From the same list you can choose which items to show in the Sidebar.
trans-unit.target: 如要使側邊欄變為浮動顯示，或固定浮動顯示的側邊欄，請使用在標籤中側邊欄設定中的彈出式選單(參照圖)。在同一個選單中你也可以選擇哪些頁面要顯示在側邊欄中。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Floating (undocking) or docking the Sidebar
trans-unit.target: 圖:將側邊欄變為浮動或是固定。

trans-unit.source: Starting new documents
trans-unit.target: 建立新文件

trans-unit.source: You can start a new, blank document in LibreOffice in several ways.
trans-unit.target: 你可以利用一些方式在LibreOffice中建立一個新的、空白的文件。

trans-unit.source: When LibreOffice is running but no document is open, the Start Center (Figure on page ) is shown. Click one of the icons to open a new document of that type, or click the Templates icon to start a new document using a template.
trans-unit.target: 當LibreOffice已啟動但未開啟任何文件時，啟動中心(圖在第頁)將會顯示。在其中一個圖示中按下左鍵以開啟一個相應格式的新文件，或是按下範本來利用範本產生新文件。

trans-unit.source: You can also start a new document in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以利用以下方法建立新文件:

trans-unit.source: Use File > New on the Menu bar and select the type of document from the context menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列的 檔案 > 新增 並在子選單中選擇一種文件類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+N to create a new document. The type of document created depends on which LibreOffice component is open and active. For example, if Calc is open and active, a new spreadsheet is created.
trans-unit.target: 使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+N來建立新文件。所建立的新文件類型將會取決哪一個LibreOffice組件正被開啟。比方說，當Calc處於開啟狀態，新的試算表文件將會被建立。

trans-unit.source: Use File > Wizards on the Menu bar and select the type of document from the context menu.
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列中的 檔案 > 精靈 並在子選單中選擇一種文件類型。

trans-unit.source: If a document is already open in LibreOffice, click the New icon on the Standard toolbar and a new document of the same type is created in a new window. For example, if Calc is open and active, a new spreadsheet is created. The New icon changes depending on which component of LibreOffice is open.
trans-unit.target: 當一個文件已經在LibreOffice中開啟，請在標準工具列中的新增按下左鍵，將會在新視窗建立一個同樣類型的新文件。比如說，當Calc處於開啟狀態，新的試算表文件將會被建立。新增圖示的作用將取決於哪一個LibreOffice組件處於開啟狀態。

trans-unit.source: If a document is already open in LibreOffice, click on the small triangle to the right of the New icon on the Standard toolbar and select the type of document from the context menu that opens.
trans-unit.target: 當一個文件已經在LibreOffice中開啟，按下標準工具列中的新增按鈕旁的小三角形並在子選單中選擇一種文件類型。

trans-unit.source: On Windows or Linux, use the Quickstarter feature included with LibreOffice. See “” on page for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在Windows或是Linux系統中，利用LibreOffice的快速啟動功能。參見第頁中的「在Windows及Linux系統使用快速啟動」以取得更多資訊。

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: 提示

trans-unit.source: If all documents are closed without closing the last LibreOffice window, then the Start Center will be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 當所有文件皆被關閉但是LibreOffice視窗未被關閉，則啟動中心將會顯示。

trans-unit.source: Opening existing documents
trans-unit.target: 開啟已存在的文件

trans-unit.source: You can also open an existing document in one of the following ways:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以利用以下方法開啟已存在的文件:

trans-unit.source: When no document is open, click Open File or Remote files in the Start Center to reach the Open dialog.
trans-unit.target: 當沒有文件被開啟，按下啟動中心中的開啟檔案或是遠端檔案來開啟對話框。

trans-unit.source: Go to File > Open or File > Open Remote… on the Menu bar to reach the Open dialog.
trans-unit.target: 至選單列的檔案 > 開啟或是檔案 > 開啟遠端來開啟對話框。

trans-unit.source: Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+O to reach the Open dialog.
trans-unit.target: 使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+O來開啟對話框。

trans-unit.source: If a document is already open, click the Open icon on the Standard toolbar and select from a list of available documents from the Open dialog, or click Open Template… to select a template.
trans-unit.target: 如果一個文件已被開啟，按下標準工具列中的開啟圖示並在對話框中選擇可用的文件，或是按下開啟範本來選擇一個範本。

trans-unit.source: Click the small triangle to the right of the Open icon and select from a list of recently opened documents.
trans-unit.target: 在開啟旁邊的小三角形按下左鍵並從最近開啟的文件中選擇。

trans-unit.source: When no document is open, double-click on a thumbnail of recently opened documents displayed in the Start Center. You can scroll up or down in the Start Center to locate a recently opened document.
trans-unit.target: 當文件已被開啟，在啟動中心中點擊最近開啟的文件的縮圖。你可以在啟動中心中上下滾動來尋找最近開啟的文件。

trans-unit.source: When using the Open dialog, navigate to the folder you want and select the file you want, and then click Open. If a document is already open in LibreOffice, the second document opens in a new window.
trans-unit.target: 當使用「開啟」對話框，導向到你所要的資料夾並選擇你所想要開啟的文件，然後按下開啟。如果有一個文件已被LibreOffice開啟，則文件將會在新視窗中被開啟。

trans-unit.source: In the Open dialog, you can reduce the list of files by selecting the type of file you are looking for. For example, if you choose Text documents as the file type, you will only see documents Writer can open (including .odt, .doc, .txt); if you choose Spreadsheets, you will see .ods, .xls, and other files that Calc opens.
trans-unit.target: 在「開啟」對話框中，你可以利用選擇所要的檔案類型來減少檔案列表。比方說，如果你選擇文字文件當成你的檔案類型，你將只會看到Writer可以開啟的文件(包含.odt, .doc, .txt)；如果你選擇試算表，你將會看到.ods,.xls,及其他Calc可以開啟的檔案。

trans-unit.source: You can also open an existing document that is in a format that LibreOffice recognizes by double-clicking on the file icon on the desktop or in a file manager such as Windows Explorer. LibreOffice has to be associated with file types that are not ODF files for the appropriate LibreOffice component to open.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以利用雙擊桌面上、或是像是Windows檔案總管的檔案管理器中LibreOffice可開啟的檔案的圖示來開啟文件。前提是LibreOffice必須和這些非odf文件有相關LibreOffice組件的檔案關聯。

trans-unit.source: Note
trans-unit.target: 提示

trans-unit.source: When opening files stored in a remote server, you may be asked to enter your user name and password to log in the server.
trans-unit.target: 當開啟一個遠端的文件，你將可能被要求輸入你的用戶名稱及密碼以登入遠端伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Saving documents
trans-unit.target: 儲存文件

trans-unit.source: You can save documents as follows:
trans-unit.target: 你可以利用以下方法儲存文件:

trans-unit.source: Save command – use if you are keeping the document, its current filename and location.
trans-unit.target: 儲存 – 使用此選項如果你想保留原文件的檔名及位置。

trans-unit.source: Save Remote - use if your document is already stored in a remote server or will be stored in a remote server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存遠端 - 使用此選項如果你的文件已經存在遠端，或是要存在遠端。

trans-unit.source: Save As – use if you want to create a new document, or change the filename and/or file format, or save the file in a different location on your computer.
trans-unit.target: 另存新檔 – 使用此選項如果你想要建立新文件，或是改變檔名或是檔案類型，或是儲存在不同位置。

trans-unit.source: Save a copy - use if you want to save a copy of your current document and keep it open for more editing.
trans-unit.target: 另存副本 - 使用此選項如果你想要為當前文件儲存副本並將原文件持開啟以做更多編輯。

trans-unit.source: Save All - use to save all the files open in your current session.
trans-unit.target: 全部儲存 - 使用此選項來儲存所有已開啟的文件。

trans-unit.source: Save command
trans-unit.target: 儲存

trans-unit.source: To save a document if you are keeping the document’s current filename and location, do one of the following:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想儲存時保留原文件的檔名及位置，請做以下其中一個動作:

trans-unit.source: Use the menu option File > Save
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列的 檔案 > 儲存

trans-unit.source: Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+S.
trans-unit.target: 使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+S。

trans-unit.source: Click the Save icon on the Standard toolbar.
trans-unit.target: 點擊標準工具列中的儲存圖示。

trans-unit.source: Use the menu option File > Save All
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列的 檔案 > 儲存全部

trans-unit.source: Use the menu option File > Save Remote
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列的 檔案 > 儲存遠端

trans-unit.source: Use the menu option File > Save a Copy (Similar to the )
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列的 檔案 > 儲存副本(和儲存指令相似)

trans-unit.source: Using the Save command will immediately overwrite the last saved version of the file.
trans-unit.target: 使用「儲存」將會馬上覆蓋文件上一次的版本。

trans-unit.source: Save As command
trans-unit.target: 另存新檔

trans-unit.source: Figure : Example of LibreOffice Save As dialog
trans-unit.target: 圖 ：LibreOffice的另存新檔對話框

trans-unit.source: If you want to create a new document file, change the filename and/or file format, or save the file in a different location on your computer:
trans-unit.target: 如果你想存成新文件，或是改變檔名或是檔案類型，或是儲存在不同位置:

trans-unit.source: Use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Shift+S.
trans-unit.target: 使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+Shift+S。

trans-unit.source: Use the menu option File > Save As.
trans-unit.target: 使用選單列的 檔案 > 另存新檔

trans-unit.source: When the Save As dialog (Figure ) or Save dialog opens, enter the file name, change the file type (if applicable), navigate to a new location (if applicable), and click Save.
trans-unit.target: 當另存新檔對話框(圖 )或是儲存對話框開啟時，鍵入檔名、改變檔案類型(如果可以)，導向到新的位置(如果可以)，然後按下儲存。

trans-unit.source: Password protection
trans-unit.target: 密碼保護

trans-unit.source: To restrict who can open and read a document, or open and edit the document, use password protection.
trans-unit.target: 如要限制誰可以開啟此文件、或是開啟並編輯此文件，請使用密碼保護。

trans-unit.source: Using the command above, select the Save with password option in the Save As dialog or Save dialog.
trans-unit.target: 使用前面所述的指令，在彈出的另存新檔或是儲存對話框中勾選使用密碼儲存。

trans-unit.source: Click Save and the Set Password dialog opens (Figure ).
trans-unit.target: 按下儲存後設定密碼對話框則會顯示(圖)。

trans-unit.source: In File Encryption Password, enter a password to open the document and then enter the same password as confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 在設定密碼中，鍵入一個用來開啟文件的密碼並再輸入一次作為確認。

trans-unit.source: To restrict who can edit the document, click Options.
trans-unit.target: 如要限制誰可以修改這份文件，請按下選項。

trans-unit.source: In File Sharing Password, select Open file read-only, enter a password to allow editing, and then enter the same password as confirmation.
trans-unit.target: 在檔案共享密碼中，選擇以唯讀方式開啟檔案，然後輸入一個可供編輯的密碼，並再輸入一次當作確認。

trans-unit.source: Click OK and the dialog closes. If the passwords match, the document is saved password-protected. If the passwords do not match, you receive an error message.
trans-unit.target: 按下確定後對話框將關閉。如果兩次輸入的密碼相符，則文件將會儲存並擁有密碼保護。如果兩次輸入的密碼不相符，你將會收到錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Set Password dialog
trans-unit.target: 圖:設定密碼對話框

trans-unit.source: Caution
trans-unit.target: 注意

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice uses a very strong encryption mechanism that makes it almost impossible to recover the contents of a document if you lose or forget the password.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice使用了非常強大的加密方法，將會使遺失或忘記密碼時幾乎不可能還原文件的內容。

trans-unit.source: Changing the password
trans-unit.target: 更改密碼

trans-unit.source: When a document is password-protected, you can change the password while the document is open. Go to File > Properties > General on the Menu bar and click the Change Password button. This opens the Set Password dialog where you can enter a new password.
trans-unit.target: 當一個文件有密碼保護，你可以在文件開啟的時候更改密碼。請至選單列的 檔案 > 屬性 > 一般 並按下更改密碼按鈕。將會開啟可以鍵入新密碼的設定密碼對話框。

trans-unit.source: Saving documents automatically
trans-unit.target: 自動儲存

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice can save files automatically as part of the AutoRecovery feature. Automatic saving, like manual saving, overwrites the last saved state of the file.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice因為有自動還原功能，所以可以自動儲存檔案。自動儲存，就像是手動儲存一樣，將會覆蓋文件上次自動儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: To set up automatic file saving:
trans-unit.target: 如要設定自動儲存:

trans-unit.source: Go to Tools > Options > Load/Save > General on the Menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 至選單列的工具 > 選項 > 載入/儲存 > 一般。

trans-unit.source: Select Save AutoRecovery information every and set the time interval.
trans-unit.target: 選擇儲存自動回復資訊，間隔為，並設定時間間隔。

trans-unit.source: Click OK.
trans-unit.target: 按下確定

trans-unit.source: Opening and saving files on remote servers
trans-unit.target: 在遠端伺服器上開啟與儲存檔案

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice can open and save files stored on remote servers. Keeping files on remote servers allows you to work with the documents using different computers. For example, you can work on a document in the office during the day and edit it at home for last-minute changes. Storing files on a remote server also backs up documents from computer loss or hard disk failure. Some servers are also able to check-in and check-out files, thus controlling their usage and access.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice可以開啟及儲存在遠端伺服器上的文件。將文件存放在遠端伺服器使你可以在不同電腦上編輯同一個文件。比如說，你可以白天的時候可以在辦公室編輯文件，然後在家裡做最後的編輯。將文件儲存在遠端的同時也將文件備份，使其可以免於受到電腦損壞或是磁碟錯誤的窘境。部分伺服器也支援文件權限管理，因此可以控制文件的存取權與使用權。

trans-unit.source: LibreOffice supports many document servers that use well known network protocols such as FTP, WebDav, Windows share, and SSH. It also supports popular services like Google Drive and Microsoft OneNote, as well as commercial and open source servers that implement the OASIS CMIS standard.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice支援許多使用不同網路協定的文件伺服器，像是FTP,WebDav,Windows檔案共享及SSH。他也支援許多熱門的服務像是Google Drive及Microsoft OneNote，及商業或開源且使用OASIS CMIS標準的伺服器。

trans-unit.source: To enable a remote server connection, use one of these methods:
trans-unit.target: 如要啟用遠端伺服器連線，使用以下其中一種方式:

trans-unit.source: Click on the Remote Files button in the Start Center
trans-unit.target: 在啟動中心中點擊遠端檔案檔案。

trans-unit.source: Select File > Open Remote
trans-unit.target: 選擇 檔案 > 開啟遠端

trans-unit.source: Select File > Save Remote
trans-unit.target: 選擇 檔案 > 儲存遠端

trans-unit.source: On the Remote Files dialog (Figure ), click on the Add Service button in the upper right to open the File Services dialog (Figure ).
trans-unit.target: 在遠端檔案對話框中(圖)，在右上角按下新增服務按鈕來開啟檔案服務。

trans-unit.source: Depending on the type of file service you choose in the Type listbox, different parameters are necessary to fully qualify the connection to the remote server.
trans-unit.target: 取決於你在類型選單中所選的檔案服務，需要輸入不同的參數以滿足遠端伺服器的需求。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Remote server configuration
trans-unit.target: 圖:遠端伺服器設置

trans-unit.source: Once the connection is defined, click OK to connect. The dialog will dim until the connection is established with the server. A dialog asking for the user name and the password may pop up to let you log in the server. Proceed entering your credentials.
trans-unit.target: 一旦連接已被定義，按下確定來連線。對話框將會變暗直到與伺服器成功連線。中途可能會顯示一個對話框要求你輸入用戶名稱及密碼來登錄遠端伺服器。請繼續輸入你的身分。

trans-unit.source: The Remote Files dialog (Figure ) which then appears has many parts. The upper list box contains the list of remote servers you have previously defined. The line below the list box shows the path to access the folder. On the left is the folder structure of the user space in the server. The main pane displays the files in the remote folder. Click the Open or Save button to proceed.
trans-unit.target: 接下來顯示的遠端檔案對話框(圖)包含許多部份。上面的選單框包含了你之前所定義的遠端伺服器。在底下的輸入框顯示了所存取的資料夾位置。左側的是遠端伺服器上的使用者空間。主要區塊顯示了遠端伺服器上的檔案。按下開啟或儲存以繼續。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Remote Files dialog when connected to a server
trans-unit.target: 圖:連線到遠端伺服器後的遠端檔案對話框

trans-unit.source: Renaming and deleting files
trans-unit.target: 重新命名或刪除檔案

trans-unit.source: You can rename or delete files within the LibreOffice dialogs, just as you can in a file manager. Select a file and then right click to open a context menu. Select either Delete or Rename, as appropriate. However, you cannot copy or paste files within the dialogs.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在LibreOffice的對話框中重新命名或是刪除檔案，就像是在檔案管理器中一樣。選擇一個檔案後點擊右鍵來開啟右鍵選單。選擇刪除或是重新命名。然而，你無法在對話框中複製或是貼上。

trans-unit.source: Using the Navigator
trans-unit.target: 使用助手

trans-unit.source: The LibreOffice Navigator lists objects contained within a document, collected into categories. For example, in Writer it shows Headings, Tables, Text frames, Comments, Graphics, Bookmarks, and other items, as shown in Figure . In Calc it shows Sheets, Range Names, Database Ranges, Graphics, Drawing Objects, and other items. In Impress and Draw it shows Slides, Pictures, and other items.
trans-unit.target: LibreOffice的助手會顯示在文件中的物件，並將其收集後做分類。比方說，在Writer中會顯示標題、表格、文字外框、評註、影像、書籤及其他物件，如圖所示。在Calc中會顯示工作表、範圍名稱、資料庫範圍、影像、繪圖物件及其他物體。在Impress及Draw中會顯示投影片、圖片、及其他物件。

trans-unit.source: To open the Navigator, click the Navigator icon on the Standard toolbar, or press the F5 key, or go to View > Navigator on the Menu bar,, or click on the Page Number/Count area of the Status Bar, or click the Navigator icon in the Sidebar.
trans-unit.target: 如要開啟助手，請在標準工具列中按下助手圖示，或是按下F5，或是至選單列的 檢視 > 助手，或是按下狀態列中頁碼/頁數的區塊，或是按下側邊欄中的助手圖案。

trans-unit.source: Click the marker (+ or triangle) by any of the categories to display the list of objects in that category.
trans-unit.target: 在任一類型旁按下標記符號(+或是三角形)以顯示目標類型的所有物件。

trans-unit.source: The Navigator provides several convenient ways to move around a document and find items in it:
trans-unit.target: 助手提供了一些方便的方法來閱覽文件或是在其中尋找物件。

trans-unit.source: When a category is showing the list of objects in it, double-click on an object to jump directly to that object’s location in the document.
trans-unit.target: 當一個類型區域顯示了該類型的物件時，雙擊目標物件可直接跳到物件的在此份文件的所在地。

trans-unit.source: Objects are much easier to find if you have given them recognizable names when creating them, instead of keeping the default names such as Sheet1, Table1, or Table2. The default names may not correspond to the actual position of the object in the document.
trans-unit.target: 如果在建立物件時為其賦與名字而非使用預設的名字，像是表格1，試算表1或試篹表2等時，將可更容易找到。使用預設的名字將有可能不會引導到某個物件在此份文件中的正確位置。

trans-unit.source: Navigator also provides the facility to move, promote, demote items within a document.
trans-unit.target: 助手也提供了文件內物件的移動，升階、組織的功能。

trans-unit.source: Each Navigator in the individual LibreOffice components has a different range of functions. These functions are further explained in the user guide for each LibreOffice component.
trans-unit.target: 每個LibreOffice組件中的助手擁有不同的功能。這些功能的詳細解說將在每個LibreOffice組件的使用說明中提及。

trans-unit.source: Figure : Navigator in Writer
trans-unit.target: 圖:Writer的助手

trans-unit.source: Undoing and redoing changes
trans-unit.target: 復原或重作改變

trans-unit.source: To undo the most recent unsaved change in a document, use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Z, or click the Undo icon on the Standard toolbar, or go to Edit > Undo on the Menu bar. Click the small triangle to the right of the Undo icon to get a list of all the changes that can be undone. You can select multiple changes and undo them at the same time.
trans-unit.target: 如要復原文件中最近一次未儲存的變更，請使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+Z，或是標準工具列中的取消動作按鈕，或是至選單列的 編輯 > 取消動作 。按下取消動作圖示旁的小三角形以取得可復原變更的清單。你也可以選擇複數個變更然後同時復原。

trans-unit.source: After changes have been undone, you can redo changes. To redo a change use the keyboard shortcut Ctrl+Y, or click the Redo icon, or go to Edit > Redo on the Menu bar. As with Undo, click on the triangle to the right of the arrow to get a list of the changes that can be reapplied.
trans-unit.target: 當變更被復原，你可以重做變更，如要重做變更請使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+Y，或是按下再次動作圖示，而就像復原一樣，你可以按下圖示旁的小三角形來取得可重作變更的列表。

trans-unit.source: To repeat the last command applied to your document, use the shortcut Ctrl+Shift+Y. This can save several repetitive menu navigation clicks or keyboard shortcuts, especially when the command is taken from a secondary menu.
trans-unit.target: 如要重複你對於文件最後的變更，請使用鍵盤快捷鍵Ctrl+Shift+Y。這個方式可以省下重複至選單中按下指令及鍵盤快捷鍵的時間，特別是當某個指令是在二階選單內時。

trans-unit.source: Reloading a document
trans-unit.target: 重新載入一個文件

trans-unit.source: You may want to discard all the changes made in an editing session after the last document save. But undoing each change or remembering where the changes took place can be a difficult task. If you are sure you do not want to keep the changes from the last save operation, you can reload your document. A copy of the document that is currently stored in the file system is loaded. The document returns to the state where it was last saved.
trans-unit.target: 你可能會在儲存後想要捨棄所有在此次編輯中的所有變更，但是請注意復原或是記憶變更所在的位置可能是一項麻煩的工作。如果你確定並不想要從上次儲存以來的變更，你可以重新載入文件。則當前系統中所儲存的文件將會被載入。文件將會回到上次儲存的狀態。

trans-unit.source: To reload a document, go to File > Reload on the menu bar. If you have made changes to a file since the last save, a confirmation dialog will warn you that Reloading will discard your last changes. On reloading your document, the File dialog will not open, because the file is already selected.
trans-unit.target: 如要重新載入文件，請至標題列的 檔案 > 重新載入。如果你在上次儲存後有對文件做變更，確認對話框將顯示並提醒重新載入將會捨棄變更。在重新載入文件中，檔案對話框將不會顯示，因為檔案已經被選定。

trans-unit.source: Closing a document
trans-unit.target: 關閉文件

trans-unit.source: If only one document is open and you want to close that document, go to File > Close on the Menu bar or click on the X on the right or left end of the Menu bar. On Windows and Linux, the document closes and the LibreOffice Start Center opens. On macOS, the document closes and only the Menu bar remains at the top of the screen.
trans-unit.target: 如果只有一個文件被開啟且你想要關閉那個文件，請至選單列的 檔案 > 關閉 或是按下標題列左側或是右側的X按鈕。在Windows或是Linux系統中，文件將會被關閉並開啟LibreOffice啟動中心。在macOS中，文件將會被關閉並只剩下選單列出現在視窗的上方。

trans-unit.source: If more than one document is open and you want to close one of them, go to File > Close on the Menu bar or click on the X on the title bar of that document’s window. The X may be located on either the right or left end of the title bar.
trans-unit.target: 當大於一個文件被開啟且你想要關閉其中一個時，請至目標文件視窗中選單列的 檔案 > 關閉 或是按下標題列中的X按鈕。X有可能出現在標題列的左側或是右側。

trans-unit.source: If the document has not been saved since the last change, a message box is displayed. Choose whether to save or discard your changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件有未儲存的變更，將會顯示訊息框。可以選擇是否要儲存變更。

trans-unit.source: Caution
trans-unit.target: 注意

trans-unit.source: Not saving your document could result in the loss of recently made changes, or worse still, the entire file.
trans-unit.target: 未儲存你的文件將會遺失許多最近的變更，或甚至是整個文件。

trans-unit.source: Closing LibreOffice
trans-unit.target: 關閉LibreOffice

trans-unit.source: To close LibreOffice completely, go to File > Exit on the Menu bar in Windows and Linux operating systems. In a Mac operating system, go to LibreOffice > Quit LibreOffice on the Menu bar.
trans-unit.target: 如要完全關閉LibreOffice，在Windows及Linux的系統中，請至選單列的 檔案 > 離開LibreOffice。在Mac作業系統中，請至選單列的 檔案 > 離開LibreOffice。

trans-unit.source: When you close the last document using the X on the title bar of the window, then LibreOffice will close completely. A Mac operating system does not have this function; instead, you need to use to LibreOffice > Quit LibreOffice.
trans-unit.target: 當你利用標題列上的X按鈕關閉最後一個開啟的文件後，LibreOffice將會完全關閉。使用Mac作業系統的電腦將不會有這個功能；請至 LibreOffice > 離開 LibreOffice。

trans-unit.source: You can also use a keyboard shortcut as follows:
trans-unit.target: 你也可以利用以下鍵盤快捷鍵:

trans-unit.source: In Windows and Linux – Ctrl+Q
trans-unit.target: 在Windows或Linux中 – Ctrl+Q

trans-unit.source: In macOS – Command ⌘+Q
trans-unit.target: 在macOS中 – Command ⌘+Q

trans-unit.source: If any documents have not been saved since the last change, a message box is displayed. Choose whether to save or discard your changes.
trans-unit.target: 如果文件有未儲存的變更，將會顯示訊息框。可以選擇是否要儲存變更。
